Diese Erweiterung der digitalen Kopie wird Ihnen das Spiel auch auf einer regulären Disc (CD/DVD) in einer handelsüblichen DVD Verpackung 

(DVD Keepcase) bringen. Dieses Paket wird professionel von einer CD Fabrik hergestellt werden, die Auflage wird dabei mindestens 500 Stück 

betragen und wird zum Verkauf angeboten werden sobald das Spiel fertig gestellt ist. Dieser Perk enthält weltweiten, unversicherten 

Versand.Hinweis: Die Verpackung wird bei Perks ab 100 € und dem Perk "The Big Box" handsigniert sein.Enthalten in "Box Upgrade", "Alpha Box Package (Supporter)" und allen Perks ab 50 €Lieferung: Sobald das Spiel die Version 1.0 erreicht. Dieser Zeitpunkt kann aktuell nur als "wenn es fertig ist" angegeben werden und 

hängt stark von den verfügbaren Geldmittel für die Entwicklung ab. Sobald ich Vollzeit an dem Spiel arbeiten kann sollte es in weniger als 

einem Jahr fertig gestellt sein, andernfalls gehe ich von etwa 3 Jahren aus.
Der innere Kreis
Dies wird Ihnen den Titel "The Inner Circle" (also Der innere Kreis auf Deutsch) im Forum des Spiels geben und Ihnen Zugriff auf einen 

separaten Bereich des Forums geben, in dem Sie aktuelle Entwicklungs-Versionen finden können. Dies sind oftmals Mini-Updates, Fassungen mit 

neuen, noch ungetesteten Funktionen oder gar experimentelle Fassungen. Sie können zu den Ersten gehören die all die neuen Dinge ausprobieren 

können. Feedback an den Entwickler ist dabei natürlich erwünscht.Enthalten in allen Perks ab 50 €Lieferung: Innerhalb von 24 Stunden
Ein individuelles T-shirt
Sie erhalten ein hochwertiges T-Shirt mit einem großen Aufdruck bestehend aus einem Ihrer Autos und dem finalen Cars Incorporated-Logo auf 

der Vorderseite. Dafür wird dann ein Spielstand und der Name des gewünschten Autos von Ihnen benötigt.Enthalten in "The Big Box" und allen Perks ab 100 €Lieferung: Sobald das Spiel die Version 1.0 erreicht. Das T-Shirt wird zusammen mit der physikalischen Kopie verschickt.
Ihre Geschichte
Sie können eine kurze Auto-bezogene Geschichte schreiben, die aus 3-10 individuellen Missionen besteht, die die Spieler lösen müssen. 

Missionen können Ziele wie "Produzieren Sie ein Auto 100 mal" oder "bauen Sie ein Auto mit der Komponente X" oder "bauen Sie einen Motor mit 

x PS" beinhalten. Ich werde natürlich mit Ihnen zusammenarbeiten um Ihre Geschichte ins Spiel zu bringen.Hinweis: Ihre Geschichte MUSS von mir genehmigt werden um Misbrauch, Spam oder illegalen Aktivitäten vorzubeugen.Enthalten in  dem Perk "Your Story" und nur da. Limitiert auf 10.Lieferung: Mit der Veröffentlichung von Version 0.40. Der genaue Zeitrahmen hängt von der Finanzierung dieses Spiels durch die 

Kampagne und künftigen Verkäufen ab. Vermutlich wird es im Sommer 2014 soweit sein, eine erfolgreiche Finanzierung kann den Zeitbedarf für 

die Entwicklung auf etwa 2 Monate reduzieren.
Seien Sie im Spiel
Das Spiel läuft momentan mit 10 Standard Computer Gegnern, die in alle zukünftigen Spielen dabei sein werden. Version 0.4x wird Interaktionen 

mit diesen ermöglichen, beispielsweise Vertragsverhandlungen. Mit diesem Perk wird einer dieser Computer Gegner IHREN Namen und IHR Gesicht 

bekommen, sofern Sie ein akzeptables Photo von sich zur Verwendung im Spiel bereit stellen.
Hinweis: Das Photo muss ein Portrait sein mit einem möglichst einfarbigen Hintergrund und Sie sollten darauf in einem Businessoutfit 

(Anzug, zumindest aber ein Hemd mit Kragen) zu sehen sein.Enthalten in dem Perk "Be In The Game" und nur da.Lieferung: Mit der Veröffentlichung von Version 0.40. Der genaue Zeitrahmen hängt von der Finanzierung dieses Spiels durch die 

Kampagne und künftigen Verkäufen ab. Vermutlich wird es im Sommer 2014 soweit sein, eine erfolgreiche Finanzierung kann den Zeitbedarf für 

die Entwicklung auf etwa 2 Monate reduzieren.
Lebenslanges Paket (box/digital)
Ich bin im Herzen ein Spieleentwickler und als solcher habe ich viele Pläne für zukünftige Spiele die ich Stück für Stück nach der 

Fertigstellung von Cars Incorporated in Angriff nehmen werden. Ein paar davon hatten funktionierende Prototypen in der Vergangenheit, wurden 

aber auf Grund von Zeitmangel nie zu einem Spiel weiterentwickelt. Nach Cars Incorporated werde ich die Zeit haben an diesen Konzepten zu 

arbeiten. Sie enthalten einige weitere Wirtschaftssimulationen, einen Weltraum Action/Strategie-Mix und einige Adventures, gewöhnlich mit 

einem Kern, der es Ihnen erlauben wird Ihre eigene Kreativität auszuleben.
Mit diesem Perk erhalten Sie eine Kopie von jedem einzelnen dieser Spiele, sobald sie erscheinen. Jedes Spiel, dass ich jemals machen werde. 

Sicher ist das ein kleines Risiko für Sie, es kann Ihnen aber auch genauso gut viele tolle Spiele kostenlos in der Zukunft bringen.Hinweis: Sie erhalten die Spiele in der Form die durch den jeweiligen Perk bestimmt wird, also entweder digital (als Download) oder 

box (in einer Verkaufsverpackung). Sollte ein Spiel in der jeweiligen Form nicht verfügbar sein erhalten Sie es in der jeweils verfügbaren 

Fassung.Enthalten in  dem Perk "Lifetime package (digital/box)" und nur daLieferung: Zu verschiedenen Zeitpunkten in der Zeit in der sowohl Sie, als auch ich am Leben sind ;-)
Sponsor
Dies ist für Sie wenn Sie entweder verrückt genug oder wohlhabend genug sind um die restliche Entwicklung des Spiels (ohne Add-On) zu 

bezahlen. Sie erhalten dafür einen 130x130 Pixel großen Sponsor Platz auf dem Titelbildschirm in dem Ihr Logo gezeigt wird und auf Ihre 

Webseite verlinkt, dazu der Text "Gesponsort von".Hinweis: Sowohl das Bild als auch die Webseite müssen Ihnen gehören oder von Ihnen vertreten werden und dürfen keine illegalen oder 

beleidigenden Inhalte zeigen, sie dürfen auch nicht politisch oder religiös sein. Bitte kontaktieren Sie mich, falls Sie nicht sicher sind, 

dass Ihre Seite akzeptabel ist.Enthalten in dem Perk "The Dedicated One" und nur da, limitiert auf 1.Lieferung: Dies wird in die nächste erreichbare Version eingearbeitet nachdem Sie die nötigen Materialien zur Verfügung gestellt 

haben. Mit der Menge an finanziellen Mitteln wird das wahrscheinlich weniger als 1-2 Wochen bedeuten.

Auch ohne direkt zur Kampagne 

beizutragen können Sie Cars Incorporated unterstützen, indem Sie es und die Kampagne bekannter machen - denn die mangelnde Bekanntheit ist 

das größte Problem des Spiels, abgesehen von fehlendem Budget. Und nebenbei können Sie auch noch das Spiel in digitaler und verpackter 

Version gewinnen, ebenso wie T-Shirts, Zugriff auf Entwicklungsversionen zwischen den Veröffentlichungen und Sie können sogar selbst ein Teil 

des Spiels werden.Alles was Sie dafür tun müssen, ist die Tools zu benutzen die Indiegogo auf der Startseite der Kampagne bereitstellt um sie bekannter zu 

machen. Wenn Sie eingeloggt sind während Sie das tun kann Indiegogo verfolgen wieviele Leute Sie hierher senden. Machen Sie nur solange die 

Kampagne noch läuft sicher, dass Sie sie hierher schicken und nicht auf die Homepage des Spiels, denn das kann Indiegogo nicht verfolgen.
Für jeden Referral, oder einzigartigen Besucher (im Sinne von einer einzelnen IP) erhalten Sie einen Punkt. Für jeden Euro den ein 

Besucher von Ihnen beiträgt erhalten Sie 5 Punkte - limitiert natürlich auf die, die Indiegogo zählen kann. Die 5 Personen mit den meisten 

Punkten am Ende der Kampagne erhalten folgende Preise:
1. Preis *
Sie erhalten den Perk "Be In The Game" kostenfrei. Dies enthält sofortigen Zugriff auf die Alpha-Version und alle folgenden Versionen, 

eine signierte, verpackte Kopie des Spiels mit Ihrem Schlüssel sobald die Version 1.0 erreicht ist, Zugriff auf die Entwicklungsversionen, 

ein cooles T-Shirt mit einem Ihrer Autos aus dem Spiel UND die Verewigung Ihres Namens und Bildes (falls gewünscht) als einer der 10 

Standard-Computer-Gegner.
2. & 3. Preis *
Sie erhalten den Perk "The Inner Circle" kostenfrei. Dies beinhaltet sofortigen Zugriff auf die aktuelle und alle folgenden Vollversionen 

des Spiels, eine verpackte Kopie mit Ihrem Registrierungs-Schlüssel sobald die Version 1.0 erreicht ist und Zugriff auf die 

Entwicklungsversionen.
4. & 5. Preis *
Sie erhalten den Perk "Alpha Package Supporter" kostenfrei und damit vollen Zugriff auf die aktuelle und alle künftigen Vollversionen des 

Spiels, inkl. Add-Ons.
Ich versende reguläre Kampagnen-Updates mit dem Stand des Wettbewerbs, also stellen Sie am besten sicher, dass Sie der Kampagne 

folgen.Referral-Wettbewerb Bedingungen
* Sollte die Kampagne am Ende weniger als 500 € eingenommen haben, so können alle Preise auf den Perk "Alpha Package Supporter" reduziert 

werden. Unterstützer die mindestens 100 Referrals geworben haben sind davon nicht betroffen und werden auf jeden Fall mit dem vollen Preis 

belohnt, bei weniger hängt es von der Aktivität des Werbenden ab und liegt in meinem Ermessen. Bezahlte Perks werden davon selbstverständlich 

nicht berührt und werden voll erfüllt, völlig unabhängig davon wie die Kampagne ausgeht. Mitarbeiter des Projekts (David Klande, Martin 

Herrmann und bezahlte Werbe-Treibende) können selbstverständlich NICHT an dem Wettbewerb teilnehmen.Inhalt:   Einführung   Seien Sie dabei   Die 

Finanzierung   Der Wettbewerb

story:
Pour lire en français cliquez ici

What are the reasons for such a project?

The project of a laboratory-school was born of all the comments and requests received from several parties over the years. We listened, we understood their concerns, their needs, their inability to find the solution by themselves.

The main irritants come from all humans’ problems. Who today does not care for the following: 

  • Climate changes that affect a good vegetable production 
  • GMOs increasingly present in our food without our knowledge 
  • Skyrocketing costs of fruit and vegetables 
  • Increasing pollution 
  • The proliferation of chemtrails that discharge pollutants into the air and soil 
  • Our population whose average age is higher and higher 
  • From the increasing number of depression and suicide cases among our elderly 
  • The health of humans who consume too much fast food products 
  • The very marked "living home" trend 
  • The green space that is increasingly restricted in our cities 
  • The air quality in homes and apartments 
  • Children who these days don't know where their food comes from
  • The growing seasons are too short 
  • The growing number of inhabitants in the colder regions 
  • and more.

The list could be much longer, alas.


How do we fix it?

All this led us to seek a solution that would provide a valid response to each of those factors. After more than four years of research and various tests, we have come to the conclusion that indoor gardening is the solution to all these problems.

Climate changes that affect a good vegetable production
Home conditions remain the same.

GMOs increasingly present in our food without our knowledge
With organic farming is no longer a question of GMOs.

Skyrocketing costs of fruit and vegetables
Fruits and vegetables grow throughout the year ensuring adequate supply for each.

Increasing pollution
Plants also consume CO2 and contribute to the purification of the air. In addition, adequate facilities provide air quality throughout the room and more.

The proliferation of chemtrails that discharge pollutants into the air and the ground
Fortunately chemtrails do not enter our homes unless we open the windows during spraying. Their residues will not be deposited on our cultures.

Our population whose average age is higher and higher
People as they age are increasingly sedentary. They need an activity and passion. Cultivating culture at home quickly becomes a passion. You will not get bored.

The increasing number of depression and suicide cases among our elderly
Elderly people often feel useless. They do more long-term projects and suddenly many lose the will to live. Gardening is increasingly the favorite activity for these people but when winter shows up and you have to live inside for months with nothing to do but get bored, morale no longer holds. 

Therefore this project is very important for this category of people. Easy to learn and maintain, they can handle it throughout the year. Even people with disabilities are able to practice indoor gardening. Moreover, it is an activity that we expect to promote hosting institutions to provide healthy food and especially an enjoyable activity that allows people to invest in their own time to achieve a positive result.

This is what is lacking in our depressed people who are dying of boredom to the point of being physically ill.

The health of humans who consume too much fast food products
We noticed that people who have been growing their own fruit and vegetables consumed them with great pleasure, whereas before they would not eat them. The amount consumed per person increases considerably when these foods are homegrown with quality and freshness that improves health significantly.

The very marked "living at home"
In the early '90s, Ms. Faith Popcorn published a book on the new trend in living at home without leaving except for really important reasons. At the time, people did not believe that this trend will spread, but now with the Internet and electronic devices, with the trend of entertaining at home, with home theater, movies on premium channels, more people spend time at home. 

Some have chosen to live in apartments with no greenery. Nowadays, these people want a garden. They love picking a strawberry, biting into a fresh tomato but the market is often far away. Driving to buy some fruits and vegetables that have been transported hundreds or even thousands of miles before reaching the table, interest very few people. 

That is why home gardening becomes important also for these people. It is not a matter of saving money but increasing the quality of life.

The green space is increasingly restricted in our cities
Parks are few and overcrowded. They offer only the lawn, a few trees, benches and gravel. It does not allow real contact with nature. Cultivating your food, touching the plants, smelling the fresh fruits and vegetables, see it grow, picking and cooking it, that is having a REAL contact with nature. This type of contact that allows human beings to reconnect with life and its energies line up with the Universal Energy.

The quality of the air in homes and apartments.
By growing plants in the house, you enjoy the benefits offered by the plants when they breathe. Plants recover CO2 and give off a natural scent that makes good sense. Through well-designed facilities, even allergy sufferers are able to cultivate it since it is possible to keep the seedlings under control and where the air is clean.

Children who these days don't know where their food comes from
Your children will grow plants from seed, they will evolve to flowers and fruits and vegetables. They will learn about pollination and why it is necessary. Finally, they can pick their favorite fruit or vegetable and chew on them immediately. They will always want more and you'll enjoy allowing them to eat another vegetable or fruit without worrying about their blood sugar level or the impact on their health.

The growing seasons are too short
In the house, with special lighting for indoor gardening, there is a GOOD SEASON for gardening all year round. You can even grow EXOTIC fruits and vegetables!

The growing number of inhabitants in the colder regions
The cost of homes have become too expensive in large cities, and the fact is that more and more people make their living on the Internet, meaning that rural and remote areas are becoming more popular. The difficulty lies in the fact that these regions are often further north or south, preventing the amateur gardener to harvest over a long period. With indoor gardening, this problem no longer exists.

As there are many methods of cultivation and facilities of all kinds, some of which are sometimes risky, there is an urgent need for an external and neutral organization to make the appropriate tests. 

Currently, only companies that manufacture accessories and facilities offer information about it. We want to offer a real comparison between the different offers currently available. We also wish to prepare alternatives to small budgets to advise people of the solution that best fit their needs.

It was after these considerations that the project was born.


What we need to realize

We already have the location and the space for it. Some renovations and alterations need to be made, before the facilities can be ready.

To allow you to follow the development of operations, the project will be divided into several stages, and you will be kept updated if you wish, as and when the work progresses.

The first step is to get the renovations done.

It is very important to achieve our goal to have the premises ready before starting the laboratory school.

As it is about creating an indoor garden, we have found that no present premises is suitably adapted to the specific needs of the facilities required for the project.

This is why we need to achieve our goals in order to have the setup ready before we can proceed with the installation of all equipment for indoor gardening.

A change of windows is required to enable the installation of the air pipes. Installation of a new electrical system is also necessary to meet government requirements.

The walls, ceiling and floor will also need to be insulated and covered with a material that is moisture- and mold-proof.

Equipment necessary for an indoor garden does not cause such problems such as moisture but it is prudent to provide for unforeseen circumstances. These situations could arise if there is an equipment failure in hydroponics, for example.

As we are considering the inner permaculture, there will be a pool for fish farming. There are always potential risks to be assessed and it is necessary to prepare even though we firmly believe that none of this will happen.

Changes will be made to the water inlet and the outlet of the sewer to allow for the passage of larger particles when the containers used for the growing crop are washed. It might be necessary to break the cement floors and walls to install the new piping.

We will also need to install a tank to provide water to wash plants to remove undesirable elements. The tank could be as small as a bathtub or a large container.

The laboratory school will go much further than what people will do at home as we test a lot of techniques and equipment in order to inform and educate people about the techniques that best fit their situation.

It is in this laboratory that we simulate all the possibilities and identify all the potential problems.

This is why the first step in adapting the premises to the project is vital. Without achieving this objective, the project will encounter problems.

Cost: $ 12,750


Costs of the following steps are shown for information purposes and if this campaign raises the necessary funds, we can go much faster in the development of the company and the start of operations. 

Therefore, if you wish to participate in all stages, it would be better to leave us an email address that you check regularly. We will notify you of the progress of the project and the beginning of each of the other steps. We can also inform you of the opening of the next fundraising.

Here is an overview of the following:

The second step is to purchase and install the necessary equipment. Equipment costs $ 22,000, installation costs (labor and specialized workers) $ 7,945.

Total $ 29,945.

This cost does not represent the conventional system that would suit a residence but several other facilities in order to test and develop work strategies to optimize performance.

We have at least 4 different types of facilities (2 hydroponic and 2 soil) and will be divided to avoid the uncertainty of assessments for each system.

If we receive more money than the minimum necessary, we will increase the number of installations.

Our room is able to accommodate 8 installations without any problems and we can quickly triple the usable surface over a room for more installations, on-site training and an office where the administrative and video editing work is done. There will be only planning done there as to the steps described in this application work.

The third step involves seeding and transplant, and the testing of aquaponics and soil gardening. This stage will cost $ 5,085. This amount will include the purchase cost of certified organic seeds, equipment, seed conservation in the long term, sprout ready for transplantation, land plants, organic fertilizers and other products necessary for the implementation of the various tests, and of course the labor required for this operation and the video recording of all stages. We will also begin domestic composting.

The fourth step will involve the growth of plants and their pollination as at harvest. This work requires human intervention for the daily checks, watering as needed and pollination. The amount required is also wages for those in charge of video production, documentation, project management and statistics, quality control, procurement and marketing to the next step. We estimate the cost of this phase spread over three months to be $ 28,250.

The fifth step will be the opening of the Education Department. It is here that we will design the on-site training to be provided and we will prepare the website for online purchase of video boxes.

Costs are estimated at $ 20,340 and are mostly reserved for the work of the webmaster and programmer, procurement and preparation of teaching materials. The salaries of trainers and staff of the company come from revenue from on-site registration and sales via the Internet.

The sixth step will teaches how to preserve food that is grown. We then go into a final stage to complement the cycle of food self-sufficiency as we teach the art of dehydration, canning, salting, and we also explore the world of recipes to change the modern diet to improve health.

We estimate the cost of this last step to be $ 10,400. This investment could probably come from profits but we still prefer to provide for it as other costs will already be supported by the revenues of the company. As it is possible that the launch could be delayed or move faster than we expect, we believe it is prudent to include this amount in our financial forecast. This amount will be used to purchase specialized equipment mainly food preservation. Labor costs should be covered by the benefits of training already sold.

All stages, from the first stage, will be filmed and will provide very accurate and detailed training.

Throughout the stages 3, 4 and 5, we will receive students for training on site. These information are also available in video format accompanied by documents to help provide the knowledge necessary to reproduce the same results regardless of where the student lives on the planet. Step 6 will be available online and on demand video only. However, we envisage, if the need arises, renting a place for meetings for culinary education.

Because people often prefer to order their products from the company they trust, we plan to become custodians of commodities such as organic fertilizers, small accessories quick wear, etc. We have not considered this income in our calculations for the moment.

A book will be published to show the public this new way of life and how we make it accessible to all. We hope it will have a viral effect and will increase enrollment and sales training online.

We have the qualifications necessary for the smooth running of this project with university training in business management, multimedia, teaching and we already have published over 120 titles on the Internet.

In addition, for years, we have grown many of the foods we consume. Our main restriction is that the gardening season extends only over 6 months and we are part of those people who wish to grow 12 months a year without having to move to warmer regions.

The following are some photos of our garden.

When the laboratory school reaches breakeven or generates profits, we are committed to provide up to 5% of net profits of the enterprise to help start other projects.

Total for the implementation of the overall project: $ 106,770

Any amount received above this amount will be reserved for the development of the second part of the space to be ready to expand as needed.

We believe that the development of any remaining space before buying gardening equipment, will cost nearly $ 20,000 because it will require more renovation.

Because everything is possible, we sincerely believe that this project will address a very wide audience. We plan to work with translators when the time comes. Our videos and documentation will therefore be prepared to facilitate the work when it comes time to translate our training.

We plan to open franchises in other countries to make available this new way of living to the masses. Once we have reached our cruising speed and that our company is well established in the territory as on the web, we intend to import organic seeds approved to develop the culture of exotic fruits and vegetables.

The purpose of this exercise will allow a more varied diet to lower costs and contribute to improving the environment by reducing the transport of foodstuffs.

We are visionaries and believe that anyone can cultivate his favorite foods at home.

Pour lire en français cliquez iciWhat are the reasons for such a project?
The project of a laboratory-school was born of all the
comments and requests received from several parties over the years. We
listened, we understood their concerns, their needs, their inability to find
the solution by themselves. The main irritants come from all humans’ problems. Who today does not care for the following: 

Climate changes that affect a good vegetable production 


GMOs increasingly present in our food without our knowledge 


Skyrocketing costs of fruit and vegetables 


Increasing pollution 


The proliferation of chemtrails that discharge pollutants into the air and soil 


Our population whose average age is higher and higher 


From the increasing number of depression and suicide cases among our elderly 


The health of humans who consume too much fast food products 


The very marked "living home" trend 


The green space that is increasingly restricted in our cities 


The air quality in homes and apartments 


Children who these days don't know where their food comes from


The growing seasons are too short 


The growing number of inhabitants in the colder regions 


and more.

The list could be much longer, alas.How do we fix it?
All this led us to seek a solution that would provide
a valid response to each of those factors. After more than four years of
research and various tests, we have come to the conclusion that indoor
gardening is the solution to all these problems. 
Climate changes that affect a good vegetable
production Home conditions remain the same.
GMOs increasingly present in our food without our
knowledgeWith organic farming is no longer a question of GMOs.Skyrocketing costs of fruit and vegetablesFruits
and vegetables grow throughout the year ensuring adequate supply for each.
Increasing pollutionPlants also consume CO2 and
contribute to the purification of the air. In addition, adequate facilities
provide air quality throughout the room and more.
The proliferation of chemtrails that discharge
pollutants into the air and the groundFortunately chemtrails do not enter our
homes unless we open the windows during spraying. Their residues will not be
deposited on our cultures.Our population whose average age is higher and
higherPeople as they age are increasingly sedentary. They need an activity
and passion. Cultivating culture at home quickly becomes a passion. You will
not get bored.
The increasing number of depression and suicide cases
among our elderlyElderly people often feel useless. They do more long-term
projects and suddenly many lose the will to live. Gardening is increasingly the
favorite activity for these people but when winter shows up and you have to
live inside for months with nothing to do but get bored, morale no longer
holds. Therefore this project is very important for this category of people.
Easy to learn and maintain, they can handle it throughout the year. Even people
with disabilities are able to practice indoor gardening. Moreover, it is an
activity that we expect to promote hosting institutions to provide healthy food
and especially an enjoyable activity that allows people to invest in their own
time to achieve a positive result.This is what is lacking in our depressed
people who are dying of boredom to the point of being physically ill.
The health of humans who consume too much fast food
productsWe noticed that people who have been growing their
own fruit and vegetables consumed them with great pleasure, whereas before they
would not eat them. The amount consumed per person increases considerably when
these foods are homegrown with quality and freshness that improves health
significantly.
The very marked "living at home" In the
early '90s, Ms. Faith Popcorn published a book on the new trend in living at
home without leaving except for really important reasons. At the time, people
did not believe that this trend will spread, but now with the Internet and
electronic devices, with the trend of entertaining at home, with home theater,
movies on premium channels, more people spend time at home. Some have chosen to
live in apartments with no greenery. Nowadays, these people want a garden. They
love picking a strawberry, biting into a fresh tomato but the market is often
far away. Driving to buy some fruits and vegetables that have been transported
hundreds or even thousands of miles before reaching the table, interest very
few people. That is why home gardening becomes important also for these people.
It is not a matter of saving money but increasing the quality of life.
The green space is increasingly restricted in our
citiesParks are few and overcrowded. They offer only the lawn, a few trees,
benches and gravel. It does not allow real contact with nature. Cultivating your
food, touching the plants, smelling the fresh fruits and vegetables, see it grow,
picking and cooking it, that is having a REAL contact with nature. This type of
contact that allows human beings to reconnect with life and its energies line
up with the Universal Energy.The quality of the air in homes and apartments. By
growing plants in the house, you enjoy the benefits offered by the plants when
they breathe. Plants recover CO2 and give off a natural scent that makes good
sense. Through well-designed facilities, even allergy sufferers are able to
cultivate it since it is possible to keep the seedlings under control and where
the air is clean.
Children who these days don't know where their food comes
fromYour children will grow plants from seed, they will evolve to flowers
and fruits and vegetables. They will learn about pollination and why it is
necessary. Finally, they can pick their favorite fruit or vegetable and chew on
them immediately. They will always want more and you'll enjoy allowing them to
eat another vegetable or fruit without worrying about their blood sugar level or
the impact on their health.
The growing seasons are too shortIn the house,
with special lighting for indoor gardening, there is a GOOD SEASON for
gardening all year round. You can even grow EXOTIC fruits and vegetables!
The growing number of inhabitants in the colder
regionsThe cost of homes have become too expensive in large cities, and the
fact is that more and more people make their living on the Internet, meaning
that rural and remote areas are becoming more popular. The difficulty lies in
the fact that these regions are often further north or south, preventing the
amateur gardener to harvest over a long period. With indoor gardening, this
problem no longer exists.As there are many methods of cultivation and facilities

story:
Faster Reloads in the Field and on the Range.

If you've ever dug through your pockets, fought with those little elastic loops or heard the ripping sound of velcro while searching for another round; you know there needs to be a better way to carry your shotgun shells.

The Gunner’s Mate’s unique patent pending design gives almost any 12 gauge shotgun user an edge when it comes to quickly reloading their tube fed or break open gun.  The Gunner’s Mate is easy to use, portable and requires no special training or modification to your firearm. By participating in our campaign you will feel good knowing that you’ve supported one of the few firearms accessories ever offered via crowd funding and help strengthen the American economy.

Gunner's Mate's Features and Benefits



New Quick Sprint Reward!

Be one of first 150 supporters to contribute more than $1 and receive this limited edition Ammo-BOSS poker chip for courageously taking action early in the campaign! 


Contribute and get Perks


Lead the way as a Door Kicker and get special limited perks


Door Kicker - 3 Pack Special Coupon $108 

Door Kickers are those brave souls willing to lead the way. As a Door Kicker not only do you get a sweet discount on your Gunner’s Mates and limited edition “Door Kicker” version of the Ammo-BOSS logo patch; more importantly you’ll be invited to participate in a special virtual focus group to help us fine-tune the Gunner’s Mate final design. Limited to 350


Supporter Perks
Firearms enthusiast : $1 -Join with other 2nd amendment supporters and show the Crowd Funding Industry they need to support more firearms related projects. The money will be used to support the Gunner’s Mate campaign but the signal it sends will be the shot heard around the world.


Standard Perks 


Gunner 1 ; $40 - Receive a coupon from Ammo-BOSS redeemable for 1 Gunner's Mate and a logo patch sent postage paid.

Gunner 2 ; $78 - Receive a coupon from Ammo-BOSS redeemable for 2 Gunner's Mates and a logo patch sent postage paid.

Gunner 3 ; $114 - Receive a coupon from Ammo-BOSS redeemable for 3 Gunner's Mates and logo patch sent postage paid.


How you can help

We are in need of three important items; final design feedback from you, the $90,000 required to make Gunner’s Mate a reality and patience. Yes, the drawings and 3D printed prototype are a bit rough but we purposely stopped short of a final design to allow our supporters room to provide valuable input on the final product.

Door Kickers to the Front!

During the campaign, the Elite Door Kickers will be given the opportunity to participate in a special live web conference designed to help us put the finishing touches on the overall design. We can’t promise we’ll incorporate every suggestion, but Gunner’s Mate will go into production with your fingerprints all over the final design.

How Your Contributions Will be Used


As you can see from the itemized cost breakdown above, fixed costs such as the molds, spring development and other special tooling are the lion’s share of expenses. American made quality is a worthy investment and we all want a product that can be backed with a lifetime guarantee.

The other major expenses are the Variable Costs that are dependent on the response we get from the firearm's community to the Gunner's Mate offer.   Manufacturing the Gunner's Mate parts, having them assembled, and mailed out (along with the various swag) will require manpower. We also need additional funds to cover the final CAD design, packaging design, and finishing the patent. Finally, there are the fees related to running this campaign which are variable as well. It's nice to know this money will be staying in the U.S.

Production Plan and Timeline

Once the final design is settled and the funds are secured, it’s time to contract with the mold maker and have the family molds machined. We mentioned needing some patience; as this is by far the longest step in the process and could take up to 16 weeks depending upon lead times.  During this waiting period we will get the springs made, lock in a production window, have packaging designed, and tie up other loose ends.

After proving the mold and materials with a small quantity run, it's time to turn out Gunner's Mates! Depending upon the generosity of our supporters and the volume of Gunner’s Mates ordered this could take a few weeks, we'll know more after the campaign. By the time the plastic injected parts arrive at the fulfillment center the springs, packaging and logo patches should already be on site ready for final assembly and shipment to our supporters. 

As you can see, there's a lot of moving pieces and it takes time to get a new product manufactured and into the marketplace. In our case it could take up to 20 weeks so patience isn't only a virtue patience is required.  

Communications Plan

.--.-.. . .- .-.. . / -.-. --- -. - .-. .. -... ..- - .

We’ll be communicating with you throughout the campaign and production process. Minor updates and fun stuff will be posted to the Updates Tab towards the top of the page. Major updates and milestones will also be sent out via email. We’ll monitor the Comments Tab throughout the process and utilized normal social media channels as appropriate.


Stretch Goals

Stretch Goal 1: Help us put this campaign over the top and raise $120,000.  The extra money will be used to spread the word about Gunner’s Mate and help make 2015 a successful year for Ammo-BOSS. In turn, all campaign supporters will receive a limited edition Ammo-BOSS Challenge Chip.

Stretch Goal 2: Raise $200,000 or more and not only will you get the Ammo-BOSS challenge chip but we’ll set aside a budget and begin planning the next Ammo-BOSS product. Imagine peeling out rounds for your favorite revolver, bolt action or lever action caliber. We’ll survey the entire supporter base to uncover the next Ammo-BOSS “Mate”  for spring 2015.

Referral Reward: Get the word out about Gunner’s Mate and win a gift certificate from your favorite outdoor goods store!  Contributors will be presented with a special URL immediately after contributing (on the completed contribution landing page, under "Spread the word!") that you can use on Facebook, via email or your favorite forums to help tell others the Gunner’s Mate story. The indigogo software will tally your referrals for us.

If we hit the $90,000 campaign goal, we’ll reward the 3 most active referrers with a first, second and third place prize; respectively a $200, $150 and $75 gift certificate from the outdoor retail store of your choice.

So there you have it. Support us today at the level that works for you and spread the word about Gunner’s Mate to all your shooting buddies. Then go enjoy your summer while we stay behind and git ‘er done. By next fall you’ll be blasting pumpkins with a Gunner’s Mate on your hip. Thank you for your support!


As Seen Around the Net

New! - Nate from NSZ85 stopped by to checkout the Gunner's Mate


Practically Tactical with Nick Humphries:




About the Inventor of Gunner's Mate

Todd Luebke got his first "real gun", a Daisy lever action BB gun, when he was 9.  Raised on a farm in central Minnesota, Todd graduated from High School with Honors. He served 4 years of active duty in the U.S. Army, most of it on jump status at Ft. Wainwright Alaska.

Todd is an experienced project manager with degrees in Operations Management and Business Administration. Work experience includes 10 years in the manufacturing sector with another 15 years experience in IT and Business Analysis.

Todd started Strike Hard Gear 3 years ago out of frustration after trying to find decent gear for an SKS.  Not finding it, he created his own tactical gear then designed additional gear for other Combloc pattern rifles. 

When not crafting tactical gear, Todd is busy with his family and hitting the range whenever possible.


FAQs

How does the coupon perk work?

Due to the indiegogo terms of service we cannot offer firearms related products themselves as perks. However we can offer coupons redeemable at a later date for products from Ammo-BOSS. Upon completion of the campaign you will receive a coupon redeemable for your Gunner's Mates when they go into production.


What happens if you don't reach your goal?

The "flexible funding" option we chose allows indiegogo to disperse contributions to us even if we don't reach the stated financial goal. Should that situation arise, we'll apply those funds toward building the molds and tooling first. 

How does the Door Kicker virtual meeting work?

During the second week of the campaign Door Kickers will receive an email notification with scheduling and connection information to our virtual conferencing software.  The session will be recorded and made available for later viewing.

As a Door Kicker not only do you get a sweet discount on your Gunner’s Mates and limited edition “Door Kicker” version of the Ammo-BOSS logo patch; more importantly you’ll be invited to participate in a special virtual focus group to help us fine-tune the Gunner’s Mate final design. Limited to 350Supporter Perks Firearms enthusiast : $1 -Join with other 2nd amendment supporters and show the Crowd Funding Industry they need to support more firearms related projects. The money will be used to support the Gunner’s Mate campaign but the signal it sends will be the shot heard around the world.Standard Perks Gunner 1 ; $40 - Receive a coupon from Ammo-BOSS redeemable for 1 Gunner's Mate and a logo patch sent postage paid.Gunner 2 ; $78 - Receive a coupon from Ammo-BOSS redeemable for 2 Gunner's Mates and a logo patch sent postage paid.Gunner 3 ; $114 - Receive a coupon from Ammo-BOSS redeemable for 3 Gunner's Mates and logo patch sent postage paid.
How you can helpWe are in need of three important items; final design feedback from you, the $90,000 required to make Gunner’s Mate a reality and patience. Yes, the drawings and 3D printed prototype are a bit rough but we purposely stopped short of a final design to allow our supporters room to provide valuable input on the final product. Door Kickers to the Front!During the campaign, the Elite Door Kickers will be given the opportunity to participate in a special live web conference designed to help us put the finishing touches on the overall design. We can’t promise we’ll incorporate every suggestion, but Gunner’s Mate will go into production with your fingerprints all over the final design.How Your Contributions Will be Used





As you can see from the itemized cost breakdown above, fixed costs such as the molds, spring development and other special tooling are the lion’s share of expenses. American made quality is a worthy investment and we all want a product that can be backed with a lifetime guarantee.The other major expenses are the Variable Costs that are dependent on the response we get from the firearm's community to the Gunner's Mate offer.   Manufacturing the Gunner's Mate parts, having them assembled, and mailed out (along with the various swag) will require manpower. We also need additional funds to cover the final CAD design, packaging design, and finishing the patent. Finally, there are the fees related to running this campaign which are variable as well. It's nice to know this money will be staying in the U.S.Production Plan and Timeline
 Once the final design is settled and the funds are secured, it’s time to contract with the mold maker and have the family molds machined. We mentioned needing some patience; as this is by far the longest step in the process and could take up to 16 weeks depending upon lead times.  During this waiting period we will get the springs made, lock in a production window, have packaging designed, and tie up other loose ends. After proving the mold and materials with a small quantity run, it's time to turn out Gunner's Mates! Depending upon the generosity of our supporters and the volume of Gunner’s Mates ordered this could take a few weeks, we'll know more after the campaign. By the time the plastic injected parts arrive at the fulfillment center the springs, packaging and logo patches should already be on site ready for final assembly and shipment to our supporters. As you can see, there's a lot of moving pieces and it takes time to get a new product manufactured and into the marketplace. In our case it could take up to 20 weeks so patience isn't only a virtue patience is required.  Communications Plan
 .--.-.. . .- .-.. . / -.-. --- -. - .-. .. -... ..- - .We’ll be communicating with you throughout the campaign and production process. Minor updates and fun stuff will be posted to the Updates Tab towards the top of the page. Major updates and milestones will also be sent out via email. We’ll monitor the Comments Tab throughout the process and utilized normal social media channels as appropriate.
Stretch GoalsStretch Goal 1: Help us put this campaign over the top and raise
$120,000.  The extra money will be used to spread the word about Gunner’s Mate and
help make 2015 a successful year for Ammo-BOSS. In turn, all campaign supporters will
receive a limited edition Ammo-BOSS Challenge Chip.
Stretch Goal 2: Raise $200,000 or more and not only will you get the Ammo-BOSS
challenge chip but we’ll set aside a budget and begin planning the next
Ammo-BOSS product. Imagine peeling out rounds for your favorite revolver, bolt
action or lever action caliber. We’ll survey the entire supporter base to
uncover the next Ammo-BOSS “Mate”  for spring 2015.
Referral Reward: Get the word out about Gunner’s Mate and win a gift
certificate from your favorite outdoor goods store!  Contributors will be presented with a special URL immediately after contributing (on the completed contribution landing page, under "Spread the word!") that you can use on Facebook, via email or your favorite forums to help
tell others the Gunner’s Mate story. The indigogo software will tally your
referrals for us. If we hit the $90,000 campaign goal, we’ll reward the 3 most
active referrers with a first, second and third place prize; respectively a $200, $150
and $75 gift certificate from the outdoor retail store of your choice.So there you have it. Support us today at the level that works for you and spread the word about Gunner’s Mate to all your shooting buddies. Then go enjoy your summer while we stay behind and git ‘er done. By next fall you’ll be blasting pumpkins with a Gunner’s Mate on your hip. Thank you for your support!As Seen Around the Net
New! - Nate from NSZ85 stopped by to checkout the Gunner's MatePractically Tactical with Nick Humphries:About the Inventor of Gunner's MateTodd Luebke got his first "real gun", a Daisy lever action BB gun, when he was 9.  Raised on a farm in central Minnesota, Todd graduated from High School with Honors. He served 4 years of active duty in the U.S. Army, most of it on jump status at Ft. Wainwright Alaska. Todd is an experienced project manager with degrees in Operations Management and Business Administration. Work experience includes 10 years in the manufacturing sector with another 15 years experience in IT and Business Analysis. Todd started Strike Hard Gear 3 years ago out of frustration after trying to find decent gear for an SKS.  Not finding it, he created his own tactical gear then designed additional gear for other Combloc pattern rifles. When not crafting tactical gear, Todd is busy with his family and hitting the range whenever possible.
FAQsHow does the coupon perk work?Due to the indiegogo terms of service we cannot offer firearms related products themselves as perks. However we can offer coupons redeemable at a later date for products from Ammo-BOSS. Upon completion of the campaign you will receive a coupon redeemable for your Gunner's Mates when they go into production.What happens if you don't reach your goal?The "flexible funding" option we chose allows indiegogo to disperse contributions to us even if we don't reach the stated financial goal. Should that situation arise, we'll apply those funds toward building the molds and tooling first. How does the Door Kicker virtual meeting work?During the second week of the campaign Door Kickers will receive an email notification with scheduling and connection information to our virtual conferencing software.  The session will be recorded and made available for later viewing.

story:
My name is Kevin Dalton.  I am an anthropologist, Registered Professional Archaeologist, and also the founder of AnthropologyRx.com. 

My professional interests are in evolution, human diet, and prehistoric survival strategies; this background coupled with my interest in the Paleo and ancestral health movements has led me on the path to developing AnthropologyRx. The idea for AnthropologyRx has been sometime in the making, but only recently begun. The journey started about five years ago when I joined NorCal Strength and Conditioning in Chico, California. A gym owned by Robb Wolf and Nicki Violetti. Since that fateful day, I have been fielding questions from Robb and others in the ancestral health community, as well as presenting at various ancestral health related conferences and symposiums. As a fun, 2013 New Year’s Resolution, I decided to develop a website where I could share my passion for and knowledge of early human diets. The website went live in July of 2013, and AnthropologyRx now has about six hundred followers on Facebook. 

The goal of AnthropologyRx is to organize academic and scientific literature relevant to past human diet and to make it easily obtainable and useful for people interested in ancestral food environments.  In fulfilling this mission, I provide readers with an understanding of what we know, what we don’t know, and what we may never know about past human diet. While, at the same time, sharing thoughtful and accurate human dietary information designed to inform readers, so that they may make healthy life choices. 

I run AnthropologyRx solely on a volunteer basis.  All generated funds will go directly to website reimbursement and development, product development, and advertising.  With your donation you will have the option of receiving an AnthropologyRx t-shirt, logo stickers, or both! The light weight tees are great from hitting the gym in or just wearing around while you are out-and-about getting some Vitamin D.  

I truly feel that AnthropologyRx serves as a unique tool for people interested in ancestral food environments, the Paleo Diet, and making informed and healthy life choices. 

Help make 2014 your healthiest year ever! I strongly urge you to consider supporting AnthropologyRx.  Thank you!

story:
Today, marks the FIRST DAY of the Young Advocates Institute’s $5 Fundraising Campaign!  In honor of Sexual Assault Awareness Month and the 5th anniversary of the Young Advocates Institute, we are going to raise $1,000!  

The North Carolina Coalition Against Sexual Assault (NCCASA) is asking YOU to donate to the 5th annual Young Advocates Institute. Launched in 2012, the Young Advocates Institute is a social justice summer camp that empowers and trains 200 youth, ages 13-17, from across North Carolina during a weekend of prevention/intervention education, advocacy and leadership development seminars.

This year marks the Institute’s Fifth Year Anniversary! In celebrating what is sure to be an EPIC 2016 Fifth Birthday, we are launching our Five Dollar Campaign. That’s right, we are asking for just $5!

Here’s how you can get involved:

  • Give us $5
  • Encourage members of your club, group, church or organization to each donate $5
  • Spread the word to friends, family, and co-workers
  • Support us by following the North Carolina Coalition Against Sexual and the Young Advocates Institute on Facebook

All donations are tax deductible and go directly to the Young Advocates Institute!

To date, it has trained over 1,000 participants, and your generous contribution will help train even more!

Thank you for your contribution to the education of our state’s youth!

story:
We're hoping to transform a scruffy patch of land into a lovely community garden. The site is just outside our local convenience store in a rather bleak-looking, municipal part of Harrow. We're going to create a series of raised wooden beds planted with attractive shrubs and flowers. We're working with the shop, local charities and businesses to turn our vision into reality but still need to raise money to pay for wood, soil, plants, gravel and so on. The project is supported by Harrow Civic Residents Association and our team is entirely made up of volunteers - of all ages. Local schoolchildren will also be taking part. We believe that if an area looks cared for then people tend to care about it more. www.hcra.org.uk
www.facebook.com/HarrowCivicResidents

story:
An eco-design pencil that reinvents the resource system

This forward-looking pencil is made from recycled organic waste, but also feeds existing and grows new plants. A pencil that nurtures Nature.

As an innovative eco design, Fabula was awarded with Red Dot Award 2016 in the Green Category and the A'Design Award in the category of Sustainable Products, Projects and Green Design Category, 2014 - 2015.

 

 

 

 

This forward-looking pencil reveals how everyday objects can be created from recycled organic waste. Fabula is created from the used tea-leaves and coffee grounds from cafes, together with petals discarded by the many florists. Suppose that one coffee shop produces an average of 30 kg of organic waste monthly: this can be recycled and reused to manufacture about 3000 pencils!

 

 

 

 

 

 

The materials are further processed to create the pencil's sturdy body with its delicate grainy surface and slightly bigger volume that fits perfectly into the hand when writing. And as a writing & drawing tool, Fabula uses high-quality eco-graphite.

While using it as a writing and drawing tool, you can enrich the plants in your environment with Fabula's shavings, instead of binning them!

 

 

 

 

When it gets too short to use, the Fabula stub can be activated in water to plant a young  golden inca berry! The new plant grows from  seeds incorporated in the very top of the pencil body. By dissolving it in water and planting it in the soil instead of just throwing it away, you will enrich your personal ambience with a new plant.  

 

 

 

Showcasing pro-environmental behavior to your co-workers or to a child, encouraging them to think out of the box!

 

 

 

 
 

The seed 

 
 
 

 

Green Challenger

Fabula challenges you to live greener!  Packaging from Fabula pencil becomes the your green challenger. Complete one green challenge every week and check it successful. At the end of the year, see how green and ecologicaly enlightened you have become! 
Comes with 3 stickers so you can attach it to the wall. Perfect for the office green heroes! 

 

 

 

Green Story

Packaging from Fabula becomes your inspirational Green story to send back to Green Riding Hood ‘n’ Woof, Fabula’s green heroes! Unwrap Fabula pencil and compose the packaging in a letter shape following the instructions. Send your Green Story back to Green Riding Hood ‘n’ Woof . Suitable for children and very cool adults.

 

 

 

 

The New Sustainable Office​

 

Fabula is the most sustainable business gift your company can give to its partners, colleagues or conference attendees, thus showing proactive sustainable corporate culture. Available in various customizable creative design packaging and company logo printing options.

 

 

 

 

 

It took 2 years for Mateja Kuhar to develop Fabula as a product, after she came to an idea to try making a pencil from the recycled organic waste. Following her grandmother's example, she has always fed plants with dregs of her tea and coffee cups. They have always had a good effect. On the other side, she and her friends are still loyal users of pencils when writing and drawing. It was after she noticed how much organic material was being binned by local coffee shops and flower shops – that she connected shaped the idea of Fabula. 

 

 

For Mateja, Fabula is - the whole of its life - an object-lesson in how to create responsibly by renewing our surroundings.

 

 

Fabula – The most sustainable pencil in the world, needs your support!

 

“Have in mind that this R&D process took place in my improvised home laboratory, which not only resulted in a 100% organic pencil, but has made small contribution to the imagination of everyday objects by recycling and reusing stuff. “ – further explained Mateja.

 We need your support to finish & perfect the unique machine used in the manufacturing process.

This way, we can together make a stronger impact on the idea of sustainability.

Small innovations can have a big impact on people mindsets.

 

 

So, don't waste a good idea – write it down with Fabula and feed the plants. In the same way Nature nurtures us, people!

story:
My Story

I was raised by my grandmother. She was the classic example of a lady. The amount of poise and class she exuded has remained a constant inspiration to me. On top of that, she always looked fantastic. I passed so many hours as a child playing dress up in her clothes, and to my highest delight, putting on her make up. As I got older, I loved make up, but I struggled to understand just how girls managed to perfect their looks, how their skin was always so flawless. My sophomore year of college I entered the beauty industry with a major cosmetics company. I was hooked. I loved the ability to transform not only someone's appearance, but also their attitude about the way they looked. From healthy skin to hot pink lips, I instantly developed a strong passion for encouraging both women and men to take control of the way they wanted to look and how they wanted to feel about the way they looked. Everyone struggles with insecurities, and it is a learning process to embrace the person you are inside and out. I have reached the point in my career where I want to stretch beyond the 9-5. I want to take my knowledge of the beauty industry, make up artistry, and skin care and bring it to a one on one personal level. 


The Impact

For me, this campaign is about sharing my love for the art of beauty, it's about helping people do more than look good, but understand that beauty goes far beyond the brush. I don't feel beautiful every day, but that is just a part of life. Without a successful campaign it may be years before I am able to successfully establish the kind of business I want, one that is dynamic, creative, provides true quality, and gives me the ability to provide my services to as many people possible. It is a strong goal of mine to partner with various women's and girl's community groups to provide an outreach to women to show them not only how they can look beautiful, but to remind them that they already are. I am committed to give 10% of whatever I raise in my campaign to an association or program which advocates for women's struggles or the under privileged ( I am totally open to suggestions on this as well, and may end up using a poll to decide which one!)


What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to raise $5,000. This money will go towards an entire range of make up and skin care to address all skin types and tones, as well as client needs, be it simple day to day make up tips or an off the map avante garde look for a photo shoot. Though I don't prefer any one brand or company, quality is important to me, and I strive to use and suggest the safest, most natural, and ecologically sound products possible. I would also like to be able to build and run a dynamic website which allows possible clients to easily contact me and understand what is I offer. I would of course need all the peripherals of business such as business cards, supplies, and a small marketing fund. By achieving this goal I hope to hit the ground running. 


Other Ways You Can Help

I am of the mindset that you get what you give. I would love to partner with anyone who is in need of any assistance with make up artistry in the Portland area in order to provide my services and to build a network. My largest struggle has been the lack of funds to build the sort of make up range needed to do artistry on a large scale independently, but I am eager to get out there and start working in whatever that capacity might be!

story:
Here at the Samouni project we are looking for sustainable, traditional projects to help people help themselves and not rely on handouts. In our newest project we aim to provide the Samouni clan with several beehives and local beekeeping training with a view to export the produce they make from the hives. This will not only help provide work and income for the Samouni project but it will also help pollination of crops in Gaza.

Beekeeping is a Palestinian tradition nearly seven millennia old - the oldest archaeological remnants shows mud beekeeping in the Canaanite era in the Babb El Wad area, now West Jerusalem. Honey is a highly regarded food source with recognized medical properties, the bee even has it's own 'Sura' in the Koran where the healing properties of honey are talked about.

We are looking to bring in the materials to make 10 hives for the Samounis on our 'Samouni Project Convoy' leaving the UK on July 2nd and we are calling in the help of the Zaqzuq family, who have been keeping bees for many years in Gaza.

In exchange for training the Samounis in how to keep bees We also are looking to provide the Zaqzuq family with materials to rebuild their hives that were damaged in Israeli attacks. (See Video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BM1nj8Wc4AA). The materials will be purchased in the UK, cut and made to measure for assembly in Gaza at the Samouni project.

To clarify, the $1500 is for materials for 10 hives for the samounis including multiple 'supers' (honey storage units) 'Nuc' hives (for new swarms), hive tools and bee suits. Any additional materials will go towards making up to 20 hives for the Zaqzuq family'


Tom Baker

Samouni Beehive project

We
 are looking to bring in the materials to make 10 hives for the
 Samounis on our 'Samouni Project Convoy' leaving the UK on July 2nd and we are calling in the help of the Zaqzuq family, who have been keeping bees for many years in Gaza.

In
 exchange for training the Samounis in how to keep bees We also are 
looking to provide the Zaqzuq family with materials to rebuild their 
hives that were damaged in Israeli attacks. (See Video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BM1nj8Wc4AA). The materials will be purchased in the UK, cut and made to measure for assembly in Gaza at the Samouni project.To clarify, the $1500 is for materials for 10 hives for the samounis including multiple 'supers' (honey storage units) 'Nuc' hives (for new swarms), hive tools and bee suits. Any additional materials will go towards making up to 20 hives for the Zaqzuq family'
Tom Baker

Samouni Beehive project

story:
About Us

In mid-2012, the three of us - Lisa Spitz, Pauline Benninga, and Thara Pillai - were having a casual conversation about the challenges that each of us had faced as women entrepreneurs.  As working mothers with six kids between us, we already knew that the traditional approach to entrepreneurship wasn't a good fit for so many women like us.  And something in that discussion clicked when we realized that there was no one-stop, women-focused site that offered networking, education, news, and an active sense of community. 
 
It was out of that realization that RebelWomen was born!
 
We started with just a blog, pushing out information about entrepreneurship to women we knew. Our reader base grew while we pooled our resources and found a stellar developer to create the first version of our website, which we are releasing in a matter of weeks from now!
 
But we still have more development to do to reach our goal of providing all the features that we feel are necessary to give women entrepreneurs the support they need. That's why we launched this campaign - to raise money to develop those features! 
 
Your contribution can help us build something even better, and to help women get the confidence, knowledge, and connections they need to create and grow a business.
 
 

Why focus on women and entrepreneurship?

We know from personal experience that entrepreneurship for women often requires a slightly different approach than the traditional track. Building a business might merit the same level of atttention in a woman's life as managing a household, caregiving of children or the elderly, and devoting hours to a full-time job. It's a juggling act!
 
The 2010 government study, “Women-Owned Businesses in the 21st Century” reports on the demographics of women-owned businesses and specific challenges they faced, including:

Balancing career with caregiving

"Women continue to spend more of their time providing childcare, eldercare, spousal care and household care than their male counterparts.”

Women do not have as much time for networking opportunities

“Self-employed women have been found to work fewer hours than self-employed men...[W]omen provide more support for family and household responsibilities than men, and thus, have fewer available hours than men to work at their businesses."

Women are at a resource disadvantage in terms of…

Experience: "Past business experience is an important form of human capital for new business owners. Prior business experience and family history of business ownership have been found to increase the likelihood of becoming a business owner and to contribute to business survival and growth. Compared to female owners, male business owners typically have had more prior experience with start-ups and have been in management roles in their previous work."

Available Financing:  "Women-owned businesses started their firms with 64% of the capital levels of businesses owned by men."

We see these challenges as an opportunity! RebelWomen addresses all of these issues by bringing women entrepreneurs together to share knowledge and learn from other experts, on a schedule that works for their lives.

 

Where does the money go?

With $3,000, we can build RebelWomen Bootcamp - a series of online learning modules that women can take over the course of a week that teaches them about building a business.  From a high-level overview to the ins and outs of incorporation, women can get the information they need in a timeframe that works for busy schedules.  The development includes both the back end framework and the front end design.

Even if we don't raise the entire amount, we can still build pieces of this functionality.  Every little bit helps!

And check out the perks available to our contributors! We've come up with some cool rewards designed by one of our co-founders, Lisa Spitz!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you aren't in a position to donate funds, please share this campaign with anyone who might be interested in helping women gain the confidence, knowledge, and connections they need to make the step toward entrepreneurship, or to grow their existing business in a way that works for women!  You can do this by forwarding the link to our campaign, or using the IndieGoGo share tools.

Thank you!

Pauline, Thara, and Lisa

Video by Brielle Domings, www.brielledomings.com

story:
Updates

The campaign continues! Thanks to all of our contributors thus far. And while we're hopeful, we're a long way from our goal. Perhaps you, or someone you know, can help us get closer!

Some recent press?

http://www.realdetroitweekly.com/detroit/city-beat/Content?oid=1571298

http://www.wjr.com/common/page.php?pt=Specials+at+7+-+Destination+313&id=602&is_corp=0

http://www.after5detroit.com/play/places?id=3572

 

Beer Makes us Happy

We love beer. In fact, we love beer so much, we want to make more of our beer and share it with you. In all truth, our passion for beer is only rivaled by our passion for Detroit, so opening our Nano Brewery in Detroit was kind of a no-brainer.

Brainstorming about what we'd like to feature in our brewery has been easy. Refining that list has been the hard part.

What we know for sure:

-We're going make great beer and have an atmosphere perfect for quaffing (drinking heartily).

-Charitable contribution will be an integral part of our business model.

-We're going to make *some* impact on the community, just by opening the doors.

-We're going to support other small business in Detroit.

 

Digital Panhandling?

Turns out, opening a brewery is pretty effing expensive. And while banks are tripping over themselves to lend money to start-ups like this, we thought we'd take our efforts right to the people: our friends, family, and community. 

We like to think of this akin to a Public Radio fundraiser (the NPR dorks that we are). While a bit pesky, it's definitely necessary. The main difference? We aren't going to do this twice a year in perpetuity. This is our one capital-raising effort. After that, we better make great beer - and you better drink it.

You could give money to a thousand different things - we know that. What does supporting Batch Brewing Company really mean?

-It could mean you know us, like us or love us, and want to see us manifest this dream into reality. (Ain't too proud to beg, clearly.)

-It means you support entrepreneurship and the continued diversification of the marketplace. (There's three $50 words in that sentence alone. I mean, come on!)

-It could simply mean that you love Michigan Beer and want more breweries in Detroit, especially a brewery in Corktown (Finally.)

-It could mean you want to see another business help strengthen Detroit, one storefront at a time.

-It means that you know you can support both a start-up and nonprofit organizations with one contribution.

 

What was that last thing you said?

Clearly, we don't take ourselves too seriously. We do have a serious side, though. Seriously.

We're committed, not only to making great beer, but to making some small difference in our corner of the cosmos. At all times, Batch Brewing Company will have a special beer on tap called the 'Feelgood' beer. Why does it make you feel good? Well, aside from it being a unique beer sure to quench your royal fires, each beer sold from the 'Feelgood' tap will contribute $3 to charity. Every month, we'll feature a different beer and a different charity, with the National Multiple Sclerosis Society being our go-to charity for much of the year.

We're not a nonprofit, and we aren't pretending to be. That being said, if everyone gave a little bit, this world could be a little bit better, right? This is our little bit.

You want a charity that you're affiliated with to be considered for the 'Feelgood' tap? Check out our giving levels.

 

How we'll use your contribution

Where's your money going? A fair question. If you pulled out your abacus, you'll notice our $25,000 goal is way less than the actual amount we need. We're hoping to exceed our goal, needless to say.

Spreading the word

Not everyone has a wad of cash earmarked for someone else's dream, just kicking around waiting to be spent. We get that. Every little bit is going to help, though.

Just as important? Helping us spread the word:

Drop this link onto your facebook page, and comment on it, keeping it in the news feed:

www.indiegogo.com/BatchBrewingCompany

Tweet this link for us (and make sure to mention us):

http://bit.ly/13sMi9H @batchbrewing

Tell your friends about us. You know that beer-dork of a coworker you have? Tell them about us. Better yet, send an internal email blast to your entire company - people just love that. You can send them to our facebook page, or to the indiegogo page:

https://www.facebook.com/BatchBrewingCompany

 

Again, thanks in advance for supporting Batch Brewing Company in any way you can!

 

-Stephen

 

About me (the panhandler):

Stephen Roginson

Homebrewer since 1996.

Beverage Marketer since 2005, supporting Detroit one event at a time.

Father, Musician, Generalissimo P.I.T.A.

twitter: @sroginson, @batchbrewing

https://www.facebook.com/BatchBrewingCompany

http://www.facebook.com/StanSommerson

 

About the partner:
 
Anthony O'Donnell
 
Helping rebuild Detroit since 2006 
 
Auto parts designer since 1995 
 
Aspiring artist, Entrepreneur, General nice guy.

story:
A knife born of great design and uncompromising craft can profoundly improve the quality of your life by making your experience of preparing food for yourself, family, and friends a pleasure beyond expectation -

My name is Adam Simha and I am an experienced, passionate, and fully commmitted maker of culinary knives (I’m also and M.I.T. graduate and James Beard Society award winner) located in Cambridge, Ma.

My company is called MKS Design.

This endeavor will be called MKS Knife (http://www.mksknife.com)

Over the last 14 years I have desiged knives for corporate clients (like All Clad, Dexter-Russell, and Lamson and Goodnow), marketed my own ready-made line of cutlery (designed in 2005), and hand crafted original custom knives for chefs and individuals both locally and nationally.

Now I would like to take the next step and offer the opportunity to own hand made knives based on favorites from my own custom designs to the public.  These knives will be of heirloom quality; beautiful and functional with superb fit and finish, and made from the best high carbon stainless steel available, by me, full time, right here in Cambridge.  

Every knife produced will carry an unconditional guarantee and be welcomed back to the shop for free sharpening forever.

I am asking for $18,000 to upgrade my workshop and finance the productrion of, at minimum 25 each, of the two most important knives one needs, a 260mm (10 1/4”) Chefs knife, and a 100mm (4”) Paring knife, and durable packaging for both which will double as travel case and storage. 

If demand goes beyond 25 of each I will be prepared to fullfill orders on an ongoing basis. 

Ultimately I would like to build a collection comprising 5-7 knives that represent what I consider the essential tools for the kitchen. 

Your contribition will allow me to build out my workshop, invest in custom designed and built grinding and finishing eqipment, improved ventilation and dust control, and realize significant economies in buying materials like steel, bronze, silver, wood, hardware and grinding supplies, and outside services like heat treating and wood stabilizing.  It will also help make it possible for me to produce and offer superb hand made knives in a reasonable amount of time at an attainable price going forward. 

Initially, the knives will be produced at a rate of aproximately five pieces per week by me in the MKS workshop in Cambridge, with hopes to double that rate of production as demand allows.

In exchange for your support, I am offering as perks, one or both knives from this first run, a matching handled diamond sharpening steel, and a leather honing strap complete with instructions. 

I believe that a knife you value, respect, and care for...even love, can change how you cook and eat for the better..it can truly change your life.

Please help me make superb kitchen cutlery possible for as many people as I can. 

Thank you.   -Adam Simha, MKS Knife.
